name: StickySticks
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 164 | Theme: Hurl

Game By:  Artemis (code, art) and crattung (code, art, bgm)

Gameplay

Hurl in direction of mouse click. Defeat the cute monsters keep coming to hurt you. Be sure to quickly pick the stick. You only have one, right?

Attribution
SFX:

Slime Squish(death) by https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/
Slime Squish(damage) by https://freesound.org/people/kuchenanderung1/
Grunt by https://freesound.org/people/whisperbandnumber1/
Yelp by https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/

Note: please don't mind the exit button in webgl build, i built it and then noticed and we're out of time. >_< DO NOT TOUCH IT(exit button)!
